article.title: SAIC Awarded $104 Million FEMA Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a prime contract by the U.S. Department of Homeland Security Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) to provide training support to the Center for Domestic Preparedness. The single-award contract has a total contract value of more than $104 million if all options are exercised.
